welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Vienna, where history and charm collide in the heart of the United States. Known for its beautiful architecture, rich culture, and welcoming atmosphere, we invite you to explore and experience all that our city has to offer."

restaurants.name: Fusion Japanese Steak House
restaurants.description: Fusion Japanese Steak House is a japanese restaurant located in Vienna.

restaurants.name: CJ's Italian Kitchen
restaurants.description: CJ's Italian Kitchen is a italian restaurant located in Vienna.

restaurants.name: Chick-fil-A
restaurants.description: Chick-fil-A is a fast food restaurant located in Vienna.

restaurants.name: Penn Station East Coast Subs
restaurants.description: Penn Station East Coast Subs is a sandwich spot located in Vienna.

restaurants.name: Outback Steakhouse
restaurants.description: Outback Steakhouse is a steakhouse located in Parkersburg.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Washington Dulles International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A at Washington Dulles International Airport serves primarily international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B at Washington Dulles International Airport serves primarily domestic flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network for up to 45 minutes per session.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The smallest terminal at DCA, serving mainly regional flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B/C
terminals.description: The main terminal at DCA, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal D
terminals.description: The newest terminal at DCA, serving mainly American Airlines flights.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Montgomery County Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Montgomery County Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Wifi is available throughout the airport, free for all passengers.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Potomac Airfield Airport handles all commercial flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Potomac Airfield Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Tipton AAF Airport serves both commercial and military flights.

terminals.name: Military Terminal
terminals.description: The military terminal at Tipton AAF Airport is used for military operations and personnel.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport for all passengers.
